Multiplayer serverlarına kaos hakim, kimin eli kimin cebinde belli değil, herkes hunharca roket fırlatıyor, köşelere pusup arkanızdan lazer atıyorlar, oyuncuları küfürbaz, crossfire dışında harita oynamıyorlar, tek fantezileri o lanet kırmızı düğmeye basıp millete atom bombası atmak her 10 dakikada bir ortalık Hiroşima'ya dönüyor ama eğlenceli.

En este juego, es un clásico de la franquicia es muy bueno ya que nos presenta al Dr. Gordon Freeman, un científico del ala 3 de investigación de materiales anómalos. (no he hecho más spoiler). La verdad es que recomiendo mucho el juego por su jugabilidad, sus requisitos son muy bajos y usa openGL, que es un motor de gráficos muy bajo, realmente me encanta mucho, así que si estás pensando en comprarlo diría que si lo agas si quieres recordar los años 1998.
Best Game of all time( In my opinion), even if Xen is absolute dog crap it is still an amazing experience but you should play "Black Mesa"  insted. ( 99%)

Half Life ist einfach ein Klassiker und es macht immer wieder Spaß es zu spielen. Wenn es im Angebot ist kostet es keine 2€ und dafür kriegt man viel geboten. 

Tipp: Zwischendurch immer mal wieder manuell speichern, weil das Spiel immer nur die letzten beiden Speicherpunkte speichert und wenn man bei beiden nur noch sehr niedrige Gesundheit hat, kann man manchmal nochmal von vorne anfangen.

Наконец-то мои руки дошли до того, чтобы пройти до конца хл1. Как только я прошёл её до конца я и написал собственно этот обзор.
Что могу сказать. Игра хороша в плане сюжета. Отличный шутер и хорошая графика для тех времён. Всё-таки игра года была как никак и принесла большой вклад в жанре шутеров. Спустя много лет до сих пор можно играть в неё не смотря на графику и возвращаться к этой игре снова и снова. Классика хуле.
Не забываем, что после этой игры на том же движке была создана легендарная Counter-Strike.

Hasn't aged the best but I wouldn't have stuck with it if I wasn't having fun. Definitely worth at least trying when it goes on sale for $2 I think. Crazy to see how this game has probably influenced so many other first person shooters I've played. Fighting the last boss kinda sucks but very neat ending.

If you are wanting a old school first person shooter with a great story and gameplay this is the game to play, I could go on and on with the detail and enjoyment I had playing what I have played so far. While the game may not look the best then what it had all those years ago it definitely proves that games can be good without good graphics. But let’s say you beaten this version of half life, there is two  other versions to play that are just as fun, if you have the money and time I recommend getting this version of half life then black masa  then get half life two and the two episodes. Half life is truly worth your time and all you gotta do is just let yourself go in.
Story is epic, characters are epic, AI is so funny-- highly recommend

As my first time playing Half-Life and a PC game in general, don't even hesitate. Just shut up and buy the freakin game already.

От лица всех игроков Half-Life заявляю, что Half-Life является одной из легендарных франшиз игр 1998 года, особенно дополнение к Half Life такие как: Opposing Force и Blue Shift. Сюжет в Half-Life конечно же великолепен, и даже как по мне лучше не побоюсь это сказать, чем во второй Half-Life. Что касается оружия: советую вам играть без HD моделек, т.к они хуже, чем оригинальные, но это всего лишь совет и поэтому никто не запрещает с ними играть. Если вам стало скучно после финала игры, то попробуйте как я пройти по несколько раз на Hard'е, тогда может вам и станет весело) В общем я написал все что хотел, и могу сказать только одно: если вы купили или собираетесь покупать Half-Life: Source то тем кто купил желаю только удачи, ведь в сурс версии она деградированна и испорчена своими текстурами и багами, все это из за стим пайпа, который поломал сурс версию игры, так что играйте в оригинал.) Game of the Century 100/10

Je le recommande vivement

It's Half-Life. It's not grade-A gaming like some might claim, but it's spawned so many other classics, so I'll give credit where credit is due. Play the game, kill some headcrabs. It's pretty good.

3/5

Half-life is a classic game, and it's got valve's signature detail. While I wouldn't buy half-life for full price, it is still a game I would eventually buy (I ended up waiting until the christmas sales) as the story is amazing. Despite it's outdated graphics, the game still runs amazingly and captures everything you need it to.

Also, if you're planning on getting this game, please remember - the game's original motto is "run, think, shoot, live" (or some order of those first two words, I can't remember correctly). You should always prioritise running and everything else *before* shooting - you will never find enough ammo!

This game is a good one, though my play time is quite low, from what I've seen in this game is a timeless classic. I have heard great things about this title and they are all true. The thing that I was not expecting is the surprising amount of horror, it was quite jarring! Overall, I am looking forward to playing more of this!

When we wewe going thwough ouw sepawation, I found mysewf wost and misewabwe. I was sewf destwuctive. Aftew weawning of the sevewity of my sewf-infwicted damage, I was bowdewwine suicidaw. Keep in mind that just a few months befowe this, I was the happiest man with no histowy of depwession ow anxiety. I have nevew had fits of wage, ow been one to bweak down and cwy, but I was in a wow spot that just weawwy buwied me fwom being abwe to see the wight on the othew side.

Today, I am cwose fwiend with my kids mothew. We don't fight, ow awgue, ow say huwtfuw things to each othew. We awe pawents, and fwiends.

Uzun yıllar önce korsan CD satanlarda piyasaya sürülünce kapıp oynamaya başladığımız ve çok beğenerek hayran kaldığımız oyundu. Ama bugün dünyasında öyle oyunlar var ki, Half Life'ın labirent gibi dünyasında başınız döneceğine bugünün çok daha iyi oyunlarını oynayın. Yılar sonra bir baktım, başım döndü geri çıktım. O gün için devrim gibiydi, bugün için tavsiye etmiyorum.
